original_text: Every day, my servants cooked one ox, six good sheep and some birds for us to eat. Every ten days they bought for me many different kinds of wine. But I did not ask to receive the extra food that the ruler usually receives. The people were working hard on the wall and I did not want to give them more trouble.
korean_text: 매일 나를 위하여 소 한 마리와 살진 양 여섯 마리를 준비하며 닭도 많이 준비하고 열흘에 한 번씩은 각종 포도주를 갖추었나니 비록 이같이 하였을지라도 내가 총독의 녹을 요구하지 아니하였음은 이 백성의 부역이 중함이었더라

sentences.original_text: Every day, my servants cooked one ox
sentences.korean_translation: 매일 나의 종들이 황소 한 마리를 요리했고

sentences.original_text: six good sheep and some birds
sentences.korean_translation: 좋은 양 여섯 마리와 몇 마리 새를

sentences.original_text: Every ten days they bought for me
But I did not ask to receive
the extra food that the ruler usually receives
The people were working hard on the wall
and I did not want to give them more trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들에게 더 많은 어려움을 주고 싶지 않았다
